sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-form :model="form" label-position="right" label-width="80px">
    <el-form-item label="标题" :label-width="formLabelWidth">
      <el-input v-model="notifyInfo.title"></el-input>
    </el-form-item>
    <el-form-item label="发送者" :label-width="formLabelWidth">
      <el-col :span="8">
        <el-input v-model="notifyInfo.sender" :disabled="true"></el-input>
      </el-col>
    </el-form-item>
    <el-form-item label="内容" :label-width="formLabelWidth">
      <template>
        <el-input
          type="textarea"
          :autosize="{ minRows: 4, maxRows: 8}"
          v-model="notifyInfo.intro">
        </el-input>
      </template>
    </el-form-item>
  </el-form>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'NotifySend',
  data () {
    return {
      notifyInfo: {
        title: '',
        sender: 'admin',
        sendTime: '',
        content: ''
      }
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style>

</style>
